author: vidkersic
content: Hello everyone. Anyone knows if there are any API providers that support debug/trace endpoints (I need debug_traceCall) on the free tier?

author: tmiychao
content: On mainnet? You can try archive node at 'https://bordel.xyz'. Let me know if you have any issues

author: vidkersic
content: It works, thanks man! Mainnet is great for now, but I will also need for testnets later
